1.text: Sara Ahmed, “**Feminist Killjoys (And Other Willful Subjects)**”, _The Scholar and Feminist Online_, Issue 8.3 (2010)

2.text: Words Eeshita found on Instagram used to describe the work of Jasleen Kaur (http://jasleenkaur.co.uk/about-2/), an artist based in London. Jasleen Kaur’s practice explores social histories, gender roles, and care in diasporic communities, often through the lens of food and eating.
